item.title: How to add a shop
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

its coords. not cords…

else if (NPCID == 534) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 30; }

item.title: How to add a shop
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

hey i was wondering how to add a shop if this is wrong place to be posting then please tell me good spot. so i got the code in auto spawn and shops.cfg but not in client. i added it in client before but it always said 1 error saying can not find symbol for NPCNPCCORDs = true; or something like that it said add it under } WanneShop = 2;
so i went there right but i didn’t see a } so if anyone can tell me where I can add this my code is

else if (NPCID == 534) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

please help me

Read full topic
